page.title: 2024 JavaScript Rising Stars
page.description: A complete overview of the JavaScript landscape in 2024: trends about frontend, fullstack and Node.js frameworks, React and Vue.js ecosystems, build tools, state management...

introduction.explanation: The following graphs compare the number of stars added on GitHub over the last 12 months. We analyzed projects coming from {{link}}, a curated list of the best projects related to the web platform. Note that you can click on a project to get more info.
